title: Now you can stay in the Downton Abbey castle for 1 night
text:
Fans of British television show, Downton Abbey, have dreamed of calling Highclere Castle home.

And now they can -- for one night only.

Airbnb

Airbnb has made the 300 rooms in the castle available to book for an overnight stay on Nov. 26.

According to the listing, guests will enjoy an evening drinking cocktails in the saloon followed by a traditional dinner with the Earl and Countess of Carnarvon in the State Dining Room and will be waited on by Highclere Castle’s butler. After dinner, coffee will be served in the library before retiring to one of the gallery bedrooms with an en suite bathroom and views of over 1,000 acres of rolling parkland.

The next day, guests will have breakfast and then take a private tour of Highclere Castle’s grounds. Everyone will receive a special gift from Lord and Lady Carnarvon to take home.

Airbnb

Reservations will be accepted on Oct. 1 and interest is expected to be very high. To book, you must have a verified Airbnb profile and positive reviews.
description: Airbnb has made Highclere Castle available to book for one night only.
